title: Return to the Ark
description: Mark Miller (One, Small World Global Protection Agency) teams with his daughter and first time author Olivia Miller.In Sons of the King, they have created a Christian-influenced fantasy world with a touch of science fiction. In the land of Mysstira on the planet Kaskaya, a great King has three sons. When a mysterious visitor falls from the sky, their world is changed forever. The sons of the King will soon face their destiny.Episode Six starts with Ekron and the other thieves escaping Dome Town. Their group suffers a great loss before they make it to the river. Ekron hopes to find his brother living at the Creatorâ€™s Ark. He has two problems: Is his brother really at the Ark? and Where is it?Kendul Grimes continues his quest and seeks the help of his former fellow soldiers now living in exile. His time alone may have cost him his sanity, but he will not allow him to stop Esephis.
author: Mark  Miller
